100% Pane
50% Pane
Start_Module_9651
EXPERIENCE THE DIFFERENCE!
Jacaranda Golf Club is South Florida’s premier golf destination offering two championship courses each rated 4 stars by Golf Digest. Our picturesque courses are suited for any skill level but don’t get lost in their beauty and charm, as you will soon discover the unique challenges each one presents. Both courses are woven into the natural tropical landscape that includes tranquil ponds and blue lagoons while you hear the gentle rustling of palm trees. With tight bunkering along the greens, tricky doglegs, and water hazards throughout, we’re sure you’ll find our courses both demanding and rewarding.
After your round, stop into one of our two on-site
Restaurants
, The Grille Room or The 19th Hole. Whether you’re looking for a quick bite to eat, a leisurely lunch, or enjoying a beverage with friends, our friendly service staff will attend to your every need. We offer
Golf Packages
for those who are vacationing in the area, and we can host your next
Corporate Event or Tournament
. Get in touch with a member of our golf operations specialists today. We look forward to speaking with you soon.
End_Module_9651
Contact Us
Start_Module_9652
End_Module_9652

Content Pane
Start_Module_7277
ELEVATE YOUR GAME
Whether you are an experienced amateur or a beginner looking to break into the sport, our golf instructors cater their lessons to your skill level. Our General Manager, Andrew Michael, PGA and his staff of golf professionals work on the fundamentals of the game, including putting, chipping, pitching, sand play, full swings, and much more.
Want to take your golf game to the next level? Call Jacaranda today at
(954) 472-5836
for more information about golf lessons to suit your individual needs.
End_Module_7277

Content Pane
Start_Module_7237
UPCOMING RENOVATIONS
Something Incredible is in the Works at Jacaranda Golf Club!
We’re teeing up a major transformation—and it’s going to be worth the wait. To make way for two fully reimagined courses,
Jacaranda Golf Club will be pausing new member enrollments for the 2024–2025 and 2025–2026 seasons.
Here’s what you have to look forward to:
New Bimini bermuda turf
on all tee boxes, fairways, and roughs for a pristine playing surface
Leveling of tee boxes
for a smoother, more consistent start to every hole
Bunker renovations
for better play and modern aesthetics
Coquina shell beds
added throughout to enhance course beauty and character
We know taking a break from memberships isn’t ideal—but we’re confident you’ll be blown away by what’s coming. When the doors reopen in
November 2026
, you’ll be stepping onto
two brand-new courses designed to elevate every round
.
We can’t wait to welcome you to the future of Jacaranda Golf Club!
End_Module_7237

Start_Module_7252
MEMBERSHIP HAS ITS PRIVILEGES
Annual, Corporate, & Seasonal Options
7 Day Advanced Tee Times
$30 Cart Fees All Year ($20 rate for 9 holes)
Waived Greens Fees
Personalized Locker
Golf Bag Storage
Complimentary GHIN Membership
20% Discount in Pro Shop
Exclusive Range Ball Pricing
Access to Men’s’ & Ladies Leagues
Preferred Guest Fees
Optional Charging Program
No Monthly Minimums
No Year End Assessments
End_Module_7252
